# WoW Guilds â€” wowguilds.com

> Free World of Warcraft guild lookup and roster tracking tool.

## What This Site Does
WoW Guilds lets anyone search any World of Warcraft guild and instantly see the full roster with item levels, Mythic+ scores, PvP ratings, raid progress, and activity status for every member. Data is synced automatically from the Blizzard API and Raider.IO.

## Key Features
- **Guild Roster Lookup**: Search any guild by name, realm, and region. View all members in a sortable table.
- **Live Data Sync**: Character stats refresh every 30 minutes. Guild rosters update every 6 hours.
- **Mythic+ Rankings**: See M+ scores for every guild member, sortable and filterable.
- **PvP Ratings**: 2v2, 3v3, Solo Shuffle, RBG, and Blitz ratings for all members.
- **Raid Progress**: Current raid tier progress per character.
- **Activity Detection**: See which members are active (logged in within 30 days) vs inactive.
- **Hall of Fame**: Per-guild leaderboards for top performers in PvE and PvP.
- **Guides**: Data-backed WoW guides and analysis using real player statistics.

## How to Use
- Search: Visit wowguilds.com and search for any guild name
- Direct URL: wowguilds.com/g/{region}/{realm}/{guild-name} (e.g., /g/eu/archimonde/pool-party)
- Guides: wowguilds.com/guides

## Data Sources
- Guild rosters and PvP ratings: Official Blizzard API
- Mythic+ scores: Raider.IO
- All data is public and pulled from official APIs

## Supported Regions
US, EU, KR, TW, CN

## Languages
English (default), French (/fr/)

## Contact
Website: https://wowguilds.com
